name: Arcane Training
description: Pick one spell subdiscipline you can learn two first power spells of that subdiscipline of your choice. Additionally as long as your [SPELL LEVEL] is 0 your [ARCANA] is now 1 and you can regain 1 [ARCANA] by spending 1 [STAMINA] during a short rest.

name: Advanced Arcane Training
description: Your [SPELL LEVEL] increases by 1 and you can learn one additional first power spell of the chosen subdiscipline.

name: Mage
description: Your [SPELL LEVEL] increases by 1 and you can learn 1 additional first power spell of the chosen subdiscipline. Additionally choose one spell subdiscipline that is from the same major discipline of the subdiscipline chosen in the Arcane Training Perk, you can now also learn spells of this subdiscipline.

name: Trained Mage
description: Your [SPELL LEVEL] increases by 1 and can learn 1 additional first or second power spell. At [LEVEL] 12 your [SPELL LEVEL] increases 1 and you can learn 1 further first or second power spell.

name: Versitile Mage
description: Choose one Spell subdiscipline, you can now also learn spells of that discipline. If you take this Perk again the [INT] requirement increases by 2.

name: Elementalist
description: You can learn one additional Elemental Spell. name: Pyrmonacer
description: When you cast a Pyromancy spell, you can gain a +1 bonus to any [SPELL TEST] made with that spell.$N Additionally at will without any [ARCANA] Cost you can summon a flame for 1 [AP] on a body part that stays there until you extinguish it. This flame can be up to the size of your fist and is hot but doesn’t hurt you. While this flame is burning it can shine a bright light up to 6m and a dim light up to 12m. When you hit someone with an unarmored attack while the flame is present it also deals 1 extra fire damage.
